TI: [The morphochemical characteristics and plastic restructurings of the hippocampal neurons after rhythmic stimulation of an extremity in old rabbits].
AB: The rhythmic activity of CA1 hippocampal neurons was studied after the rhythmic (1-2 Hz) electrocutaneous forelimb stimulation (10-20 min) of 6-84-months-old rabbits. The spectral analysis of neuronal activity revealed the age-dependent decrease in ability to reproduce the rhythm of stimulation. The cytochemical data showed that the protein synthesis in the neurons under study also declined with age.
AD: Brain Research Institute, Russian Academy of Medical Sciences, Moscow.
TT: Morfokhimicheskie osobennosti i plasticheskie perestroiki gippokampal'nykh neironov posle ritmicheskoi stimuliatsii konechnosti u starykh krolikov.
TA: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova
JT: Zhurnal vysshei nervnoi deiatelnosti imeni I P Pavlova
SO: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova. 1999 Jan-Feb;49(1):123-6.
